channel.title: Our Programs on KTC | Know Thy Choice
channel.description: Recent content in Our Programs on KTC | Know Thy Choice

item.title: Experienceship : Digital Marketing
item.description: Experienceship : Marketing Apply Now At Know Thy Choice (KTC), we are on a mission to empower kids to make informed career decisions. We have collaborated with top industry experts to design virtual internships for school students. Through guided online sessions, students can deep dive into different careers and experience them first-hand through simulations, hands-on activities and role playing games. Ideal for classes: 9th to 12th Each Experienceship includes the following:
